name: THE VIDEOKID
description: Test your skills to the max with this fun & challenging arcade style skate game set in a retro 1980s neighbourhood filled with danger...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 480 / AMD Radeon 7870 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
